pr_title: Support determine isPreviousLoadFinished for some alter jobs in table level

timeline.bodyText: the method is low efficiency, use sourceTableIdList.retainAll(targetTableIdList);sourceTableIdList.isEmpty() instread?
timeline.author: WingsGo

replies.bodyText:
the method is low efficiency, use sourceTableIdList.retainAll(targetTableIdList);sourceTableIdList.isEmpty() instread?

in most case the table list size is 1, and we should not modify the table list content
replies.author: caiconghui

timeline.bodyText: How about using a HashSet to speed up the find?
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText: actually, in most case ,the table list size is 1, and use list instead of set ,we can reduce memory usage if there are many trasactions with little performance loss
